script.name: plugin.autotrade.run
script.sourceplaintext:
* ================================= * Main MK3 Trader Script * Shared between sector, local and universe trader * ================================= $keep.wares = table alloc $pilot = [THIS] ->get pilot speaker skip if $pilot -> exists @ $pilot = [THIS] -> call script lib.ship.var.setpilotname : ship=[THIS] experience=1 rank=1 ranktype=1
$cmd.galaxy = [FALSE] if $a.maxRange < 0 OR ! $Startinsector [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_AUTOTRADER_UNIVERSE target=$Startinsector target2=null par1=null par2=null $cmd.galaxy = [TRUE] gosub sub.GetRanges else [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_AUTOTRADER_SECTOR target=$Startinsector target2=$a.maxRange par1=null par2=null $buy.range = $a.maxRange $sell.range = $a.maxRange end gosub sub.CheckJumpdrive
[THIS] ->set global trade reports enabled [TRUE]
$Version = get global variable: name='autotrade.sector.version'
[THIS] ->connect ship command/signal SIGNAL_ATTACKED to script !lib.interrupt with prio 10 [THIS] ->add secondary signal: signal=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, script=lib.ship.signal.attacked.trader, prio=100, name='autotrade.attacked'
skip if $Startinsector $Startinsector = [SECTOR]
if ! $cmd.galaxy AND ! $sell.range $can.dock = [FALSE] $xxx = $Startinsector -> get station array from sector $i = size of array $xxx while $i dec $i = $sellstation = $xxx[$i] if [THIS] -> is docking allowed at $sellstation $can.dock = [TRUE] break end end
if not $can.dock $speak = create new array, arguments=13, 135, 13, 9, null START speak array: $speak prio=40 return null end end
* Xenonhunters Dreams: Trader move to sector. if $Startinsector != [SECTOR] @ if not [THIS] -> call script !ship.cmd.movesector.pl : target sector=$Startinsector return null end end
if $Startinsector != [SECTOR] START speak text: page=13 id=135 priority=40 return null end
if $cmd.galaxy [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_AUTOTRADER_UNIVERSE target=$Startinsector target2=null par1=null par2=null $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2090, null, null, null, null, null $trader = 'Universe Trader MK3' $max.skill = 25 else [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_AUTOTRADER_SECTOR target=$Startinsector target2=$a.maxRange par1=null par2=null if $sell.range $max.skill = 20 $trader = 'Local Trader MK3' $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2089, $sell.range, $Startinsector, null, null, null else $max.skill = 10 $trader = 'Sector Trader MK3' $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2088, $Startinsector, null, null, null, null end end [THIS] ->set command display override: text=$text
* This will set the homebase of the trader to null if it has less than 5000 * credits available. Otherwise the script will not work as it cannot buy. * Problem because trader uses money of homebase to trade. * This behaviour can be wanted so there is a money check. if [HOMEBASE] $homebase.money = [HOMEBASE] -> get money skip if $homebase.money >= 50000 [THIS] ->set homebase to null end
* statistic vars $total.profit = $pilot -> get local variable: name='mk3.profit' skip if $total.profit $total.profit = 0 $current.profit = $pilot -> get local variable: name='mk3.current' skip if $current.profit $current.profit = 0 $bought.wares = table alloc $keep.wares[Fighter Drone] = 10
while [TRUE] @ = wait randomly from 3500 to 5000 ms
$pilot.speaker = [THIS] ->get pilot speaker $trade.skill = $pilot.speaker -> get pilot tradeskill gosub sub.GetRanges do if $cmd.galaxy $Startinsector = [SECTOR]
$allow.loss = [FALSE] $buystation = null gosub sub.SetCommand [THIS] ->set destination to null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=null
* Check if there is a newer version of the software... if is a new script version available if $cmd.galaxy @ START [NULL] -> call script plugin.autotrade.versionupdater : the ship=[THIS] startsector for sectortrader=null jumprange for local trader=$buy.range else @ START [NULL] -> call script plugin.autotrade.versionupdater : the ship=[THIS] startsector for sectortrader=$Startinsector jumprange for local trader=$a.maxRange end return null end
if not $cmd.galaxy $race = [SECTOR] -> get owner race $relation = [THIS] -> get relation to race $race if $relation == Foe $speak = [SECTOR] -> get object name array insert 13 into array $speak at index 0 insert 1276 into array $speak at index 1 START speak array: $speak prio=40 return null end end
gosub sub.CheckJumpdrive gosub sub.FillKeepWares
* check for fuel needed do if $use.jumpdprive @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.refuel : Fuel Range=$fuel.max Minimum Range=$sell.range SearchRadius=$buy.range Sector=$Startinsector
* check for any any upgrades $range = get maximum, $buy.range, $sell.range, null, null, null @ do if [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.upgraderepair : Search Radius=$range Sector=$Startinsector Need Wares=$keep.wares Allow Jump=$use.jumpdprive Money Availble=$total.profit continue
if $skill >= 12 AND ( $buy.range OR $sell.range ) if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Installation Kit in cargo bay do if [THIS] ->activate equipment pack: ware=Jumpdrive Installation Kit continue else @ do if [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.delivery : spawn ware if impossible=[FALSE] The ware to deliver=Jumpdrive Installation Kit Amount of ware=1 XML=0 page-id=null continue end end end
* check for any cargo to sell first @ $route = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.sellcargo : Sell Range=$sell.range Sector=$Startinsector Keep Wares=$keep.wares if $route $buystation = $route[0] $sellstation = $route[1] $ware = $route[2] $allow.loss = [TRUE] $productprice = get average price of ware $ware else
* loop until both buystation and sellstation are identified $SFreecargospace = [THIS] -> get free volume of cargo bay $skill = $pilot -> get pilot tradeskill $xxx = random value from 0 to 2 - 1 if $cmd.galaxy OR ( $buy.range > 2 ) OR ( $xxx AND $buy.range == 2 ) @ $route = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.getroute.long : startsector=$Startinsector buyrange=$buy.range sellrange=$sell.range experience=$skill free cargo space=$SFreecargospace else @ $route = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.getroute.short : startsector=$Startinsector buyrange=$buy.range sellrange=$sell.range experience=$skill free cargo space=$SFreecargospace end if $route $buystation = $route[0] $sellstation = $route[1] $ware = $route[2] @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$buystation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[FALSE] @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$sellstation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[FALSE] end end
if not $buystation gosub sub.Standby continue end
@ = wait randomly from 500 to 2000 ms
do if $buystation != [THIS] gosub sub.Buy
* Now sell the ware $sell.attempts = 0 while $buystation @ = wait 100 ms skip if $sellstation gosub sub.FindSellLocation if not $sellstation -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$buystation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] $buystation = null break end
gosub sub.Sell end end
return null
* ================================== * ================================== sub.FindSellLocation: $sellstation = find station: resource $ware with best price: min.price=$productprice, amount=2, max.jumps=0, startsector=[SECTOR], trader=[THIS], exclude array=null inc $sell.attempts = do if $sell.attempts > 4 $sellstation = null do if $sellstation -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$sellstation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[FALSE] endsub
* ================================== * ================================== sub.Buy: @ = wait 100 ms $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2082, $ware, $buystation, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text [THIS] ->set destination to $buystation if not [ENVIRONMENT] == $buystation @ if not [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.moveto : Destination=$buystation Allow Jump=$use.jumpdprive @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$buystation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] $buystation = null endsub end end
if [ENVIRONMENT] == $buystation AND $sellstation $productprice = [DOCKEDAT] -> get price of ware $ware $avgprice = get average price of ware $ware if $productprice > $avgprice @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$buystation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] $buystation = null endsub end
$buyamount = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $targetamount = $sellstation -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay do if $targetamount < $buyamount $buyamount = $targetamount $buyamount = [THIS] -> buy $buyamount units of $ware to a max. price of $avgprice Cr do if $buyamount @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.remove.black : Remove=[DOCKEDAT] Is Local=[FALSE]
$bought.array = $bought.wares[$ware] skip if $bought.array $bought.array = create new array, size=2, elements=0, 0, null, null, null, null, null, null $bought.amt = $bought.array[0] $bought.price = $bought.array[1] $bought.price = ( $bought.price * $bought.amt ) + ( $buyamount * $productprice ) $bought.amt = $bought.amt + $buyamount $bought.price = $bought.price / $bought.amt $bought.array[0] = $bought.amt $bought.array[1] = $bought.price @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$buystation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] @ = wait randomly from 5000 to 10000 ms end endsub
* ================================== * SUB: Sell wares * Flys to station to sell wares * ================================== sub.Sell: @ = wait 100 ms if $sellstation -> exists $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2083, $ware, $sellstation, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text if [ENVIRONMENT] != $sellstation
if $use.jumpdprive $sell.sector = $sellstation -> get sector $jump.range = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $sell.sector dec $jump.range = do if $jump.range > 1 @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.refuel : Fuel Range=$fuel.max Minimum Range=$sell.range SearchRadius=$jump.range Sector=[SECTOR] end
@ if not [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.moveto : Destination=$sellstation Allow Jump=$use.jumpdprive $sellstation = null end end
if [ENVIRONMENT] == $sellstation AND $sellstation $SellProductprice = [DOCKEDAT] -> get price of ware $ware $sellamount = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware $ware in cargo bay
if $keep.wares[$ware] $xxx = $keep.wares[$ware] $sellamount = $sellamount - $xxx end
* nothing left to sell if $sellamount <= 0 do if $buystation -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$buystation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$sellstation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] $buystation = null $sellstation = null * not good price else if $SellProductprice < $productprice AND ! $allow.loss @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$sellstation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] $sellstation = null else * lets sell $sold = [THIS] -> sell $sellamount units of $ware $sellstation = null $buystation = null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=null if $sold @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.remove.black : Remove=[DOCKEDAT] Is Local=[FALSE]
$bought.array = $bought.wares[$ware] if $bought.array $bought.amt = $bought.array[0] $productprice = $bought.array[1] $bought.amt = $bought.amt - $sold do if $bought.amt <= 0 remove key $ware from table $bought.wares end
$profit = ( $SellProductprice - $productprice ) * $sold $current.profit = $current.profit + $profit $total.profit = $total.profit + $profit $pilot ->inc pilot total profit: $profit $pilot ->set local variable: name='mk3.profit' value=$total.profit @ $current.profit = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.checklevel : Profit Made=$current.profit Max Skill=$max.skill $pilot ->set local variable: name='mk3.current' value=$current.profit end @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$sellstation Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] end end end endsub
* ================================== * ================================== sub.CheckJumpdrive: $use.jumpdprive = [FALSE] $pilot = [THIS] ->get pilot speaker $skill = $pilot -> get pilot tradeskill if $skill >= 8 AND ( $sell.range OR $buy.range ) if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Advanced Jumpdrive in cargo bay $use.jumpdprive = [TRUE] else if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay $use.jumpdprive = [TRUE] if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Energy Generator in cargo bay if not is datatype[ $buy.range ] == DATATYPE_NULL $fuel.max = $buy.range + $sell.range + 11 $jump.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$fuel.max $ware.vol = get volume of ware Energy Cells $this.cargo = [THIS] -> get cargo bay size $this.cargo = linear interpolation: x1=0, x2=100, y1=0, y2=$this.cargo, value=30 if ( $jump.energy * $ware.vol ) > $this.cargo $jump.energy = $this.cargo / $ware.vol $need.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=1 $fuel.max = $jump.energy / $need.energy $jump.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$fuel.max end $fuel = [THIS] -> get jumpdrive fuel resupply do if $fuel $fuel = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$fuel do if $fuel > $jump.energy $jump.energy = $fuel $keep.wares[Energy Cells] = $jump.energy end end end end endsub
* ================================== * ================================== sub.GetRanges: $pilot = [THIS] ->get pilot speaker $skill = $pilot -> get pilot tradeskill gosub sub.CheckJumpdrive if $cmd.galaxy if $skill <= 10 $buy.range = 1 $sell.range = 0 else if $skill <= 12 OR ! $use.jumpdprive $buy.range = 1 $sell.range = 1 else if $skill <= 15 $buy.range = 1 $sell.range = 5 else if $skill <= 16 $buy.range = 3 $sell.range = 5 else if $skill <= 20 $buy.range = 3 $sell.range = 12 else $buy.range = 5 $sell.range = 20 end end endsub
* ================================== * ================================== sub.FillKeepWares: $table.resupply = [THIS] ->get resupply table if $table.resupply $r.ware = get next key: table=$table.resupply key=null while $r.ware $r.amt = $table.resupply[$r.ware] if $keep.wares[$r.ware] $k.amt = $keep.wares[$r.ware] do if $r.amt > $k.amt $r.amt = $k.amt end $keep.wares[$r.ware] = $r.amt $r.ware = get next key: table=$table.resupply key=$r.ware end end $r.need.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=30 $r.amt = $table.resupply[Energy Cells] do if $r.amt < $r.need.energy $keep.wares[Energy Cells] = $r.need.energy endsub
* ================================== * ================================== sub.SetCommand: if $cmd.galaxy [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_AUTOTRADER_UNIVERSE target=$Startinsector target2=null par1=null par2=null $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2090, null, null, null, null, null else [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_AUTOTRADER_SECTOR target=$Startinsector target2=$a.maxRange par1=null par2=null if $sell.range $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2089, $sell.range, $Startinsector, null, null, null else $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2088, $Startinsector, null, null, null, null end [THIS] ->set command display override: text=$text end endsub
* ================================== * ================================== sub.Standby: [THIS] ->set destination to null $text = read text: page=2010 id=6 [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text @ = wait 100 ms if not [DOCKEDAT] $flags = [Find.Nearest] | [Find.DockingAllowed] | [Find.Known] | [Find.Friend] | [Find.Neutral] $station = find station: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=Dock race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null skip if $station -> exists $station = find station: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=Station race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null
do if $station -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$station end
$time.wait = random value from 180000 to 300000 - 1 if not [DOCKEDAT] @ = [THIS] -> move around $time.wait ms else @ = wait $time.wait ms end endsub return null

comment.var: Shared between sector, local and universe trader
Xenonhunters Dreams: Trader move to sector.
This will set the homebase of the trader to null if it has less than 5000
credits available. Otherwise the script will not work as it cannot buy.
Problem because trader uses money of homebase to trade.
This behaviour can be wanted so there is a money check.

line.text: set command extra display override: text=

comment.var: Check if there is a newer version of the software...

line.text: is a new script version available

comment.var: check for any cargo to sell first
loop until both buystation and sellstation are identified

line.text: get free volume of cargo bay
set command extra display override: text=

comment.var: Flys to station to sell wares

line.text: set command extra display override: text=
set command extra display override: text=
set command extra display override: text=

sval.val: Shared between sector, local and universe trader
Xenonhunters Dreams: Trader move to sector.
This will set the homebase of the trader to null if it has less than 5000
credits available. Otherwise the script will not work as it cannot buy.
Problem because trader uses money of homebase to trade.
This behaviour can be wanted so there is a money check.
Check if there is a newer version of the software...
check for any cargo to sell first
loop until both buystation and sellstation are identified
Flys to station to sell wares
